cu.explanation_en: Setting tracking_area_code to 0 (reserved value) will cause configuration validation failure as 0x0000 is reserved.

du.explanation_en: Setting nrofDownlinkSlots to 15 (exceeds maximum allowed slots) will cause configuration validation failure in the TDD configuration.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nrofDownlinkSlots 設定為 15（超過最大允許時隙數）會在 TDD 配置中導致配置驗證失敗。
